short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Broker Labz reports straight from the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Broker Labz official chrome extension allows mortgage brokers to utilise data from their aggregate provider and gain essential business intelligence to make effective decisions.
Use this chrome extension to:
- Generate commission reports to ensure you are getting paid the correct amount every month and understand the progress your clients are making on their products.

In progress:
- Analyse your client's data to find common mistakes.
- Validate client emails and phone numbers.
- Integrate with Mailchimp to understand how you interact with your clients.

*Currently only functional with Connective
